fullText: This La Cage aux Folles proves that even the most well-intentioned revival can't work miracles when it's fighting against both time and a tone that no longer seems quite right for our times.
dtliExcerpt: This La Cage aux Folles proves that even the most well-intentioned revival can't work miracles when it's fighting against both time and a tone that no longer seems quite right for our times.

Despite acknowledging good intentions, the overall assessment is that it doesn't work. | GPT-4o: The review indicates that the revival fails to overcome issues related to time and tone, suggesting it is not recommended. | Gemini: The review states that the revival "can't work miracles" and that the tone "no longer seems quite right," indicating a negative assessment. | Kimi: While acknowledging the production is well-intentioned, the critic concludes it cannot overcome the dated nature of the material, stating it 'can't work miracles' against the passage of time.
